content:
• Tuesday, July 5, 2011
  • BIDU

    Baidu (BIDU +1.8%), which inked a deal with Microsoft (NASDAQ:MSFT) today, also got a lift from...

    Baidu (BIDU +1.8%), which inked a deal with Microsoft (NASDAQ:MSFT) today, also got a lift from Collins Stewart, as the firm initiated coverage with a buy rating. Given the Chinese online advertising market's rapid growth, and Baidu's ability to outgrow the market, Collins Stewart believes the company can grow "at 40%-50%+ rates for many years."

     
     
     
     
    | 4:59 PM | 2 Comments
  • JBLU

    JetBlue (JBLU -4.2%) dips on a Morgan Stanley downgrade. The firm says the airline is facing...

    JetBlue (JBLU -4.2%) dips on a Morgan Stanley downgrade. The firm says the airline is facing challenges to its margins due to limited growth opportunities, internal labor issues, and increased market competition.
     
     
     
     
    | 3:58 PM
  • BCS

    VIX +1.2% on market concerns today, but it remains at a relatively subdued level and is down 50%...

    VIX +1.2% on market concerns today, but it remains at a relatively subdued level and is down 50% since November. Declining volatility led Barclay's (BCS) -2.3%) to close its own VIX ETN after it fell below $10. The moral according to Schaeffer Investment Research is to avoid volatility ETNs.

     
     
     
     
    | 3:43 PM | 1 Comment
  • NFLX

    A few reasons why Netflix (NFLX +7.9%) could profit from Latin America: over 600M people,...

    A few reasons why Netflix (NFLX +7.9%) could profit from Latin America: over 600M people, growing economies, increasing broadband usage, and a strategy that involves combining Hollywood studio libraries with local content. However, addressing the "local nuances attached to reaching customers in each individual market" won't be easy.
     
     
     
     
    | 3:37 PM | 5 Comments
  • LDOS

    SAIC (SAI -5%) is trading lower after being cut to negative by Susquehanna on anticipated...

    SAIC (SAI -5%) is trading lower after being cut to negative by Susquehanna on anticipated Federal IT spending cuts in 2012. The company generates 97% of its revenue from the government, and funding at both the TSA and DoD look "very sluggish."
     
     
     
     
    | 3:04 PM
  • PZZA

    Papa John's (PZZA -5%) is getting burned after SunTrust slices it to neutral. The firm says...

    Papa John's (PZZA -5%) is getting burned after SunTrust slices it to neutral. The firm says higher cheese prices, and increased competition from Pizza Hut and Domino's (NYSE:DPZ) will likely hurt second-half margins.

     
     
     
     
    | 2:58 PM | 1 Comment
  • GOOG

    Canaccord's Heath Terry is one-upping Evercore's $670 PT on Google (GOOG +2.3%) by asserting...

    Canaccord's Heath Terry is one-upping Evercore's $670 PT on Google (GOOG +2.3%) by asserting that the company's shares can easily reach $800. Terry sees Google's margins expanding over the next 2-3 years, and mobile advertising growing to 30% of the company's revenues within 4-5 years.
     
     
     
     
    | 2:43 PM | 1 Comment
  • REDF

    Rediff.com (REDF +16.9%), one of India's largest Web portals, is soaring after a weekend...

    Rediff.com (REDF +16.9%), one of India's largest Web portals, is soaring after a weekend Barron's article touted the company's recently rolled-out Groupon-like coupon service called Deal Ho Jaye. The service has been introduced in 40 cities so far, with plans for nationwide expansion over the next two years.
     
     
     
     
    | 2:25 PM | 1 Comment
  • EXK

    Analysts at RBC Capital Markets see a rally in silver (SLV +4.6%,) for the second half of the...

    Analysts at RBC Capital Markets see a rally in silver (SLV +4.6%,) for the second half of the year, and Phillip Futures agrees, calling for a $45 price. Large silver gainers: Endeavor Silver (EXK +11.1%), Silvercorp Metals (SVM +12.1%), Silver Wheaton (SLW +7.2%.

     
     
     
     
    | 1:32 PM
  • EE

    El Paso Electric (EE +3.4%) lights up after Goldman ups it to a buy, saying the power supplier...

    El Paso Electric (EE +3.4%) lights up after Goldman ups it to a buy, saying the power supplier is likely to experience the fastest demand growth of any U.S. utility through 2014 thanks to the continual expansion of Fort Bliss military base.
     
     
     
     
    | 1:31 PM
  • RENN

    Renren (RENN +9%) gains ahead of its earnings report slated for after-hours, but remains well...

    Renren (RENN +9%) gains ahead of its earnings report slated for after-hours, but remains well below its IPO opening day close of $18. Shares of tech IPOs could get a nice push from Zynga's IPO, and an even bigger push down the road from Facebook's debut, writes Kevin Kelleher.
     
     
     
     
    | 12:52 PM

  • Bebe Stores (BEBE +2.3%) gets a boost after Wedbush says it expects the company to post its...

    Bebe Stores (BEBE +2.3%) gets a boost after Wedbush says it expects the company to post its first same-store quarterly sales growth in four years when it reports Q4 numbers on Thursday.
     
     
     
     
    | 12:06 PM
  • SVM

    Silvercorp Metals (NYSE:SVM) is up 10.7% after reporting that a resources estimate on a Chinese...

    Silvercorp Metals (NYSE:SVM) is up 10.7% after reporting that a resources estimate on a Chinese mining property "indicates" the presence of 225K ounces of gold. The estimate also "infers" the presence of an additional 208K ounces of gold, as well as 111K tons of lead and 284K tons of zinc. (PR)

     
     
     
     
    | 11:36 AM
  • MDT

    Shares of Medtronic (MDT -3.1%) fall sharply after a Wells Fargo analyst downgrades the company...

    Shares of Medtronic (MDT -3.1%) fall sharply after a Wells Fargo analyst downgrades the company to Market Perform on more controversy over the firm's failure to disclose side effects from its bone-graft product.

     
     
     
     
    | 11:31 AM
  • ACTV

    Active Networks (NYSE:ACTV), an online event managentment service provider is up 2.4% on account...

    Active Networks (NYSE:ACTV), an online event managentment service provider is up 2.4% on account of the five firms that managed its IPO initiating coverage with bullish ratings. Merrill Lynch forsees the company delivering sustained top-line annual growth of 15%, while Citigroup touts its "deep competitive moats and network effects."

     
     
     
     
    | 11:09 AM
  • WMB

    Williams Cos. (WMB -0.6%) may raise its bid for Southern Union (SUG +2.8%) after Energy Transfer...

    Williams Cos. (WMB -0.6%) may raise its bid for Southern Union (SUG +2.8%) after Energy Transfer Equity's (ETE +0.2%) latest $40/share offer, Tudor Pickering analysts say. The deal talk, plus a ~1.5% rise in crude oil prices and other news (I, II) send energy shares (XLE +0.9%) broadly higher. Not participating: XOM, -0.2% after its Yellowstone spill.

     
     
     
     
    | 10:58 AM
  • BLUD

    TPG's acquisition of Immucor (BLUD +30%) fails to spur comparables Bio-Rad Laboratories (BIO...

    TPG's acquisition of Immucor (BLUD +30%) fails to spur comparables Bio-Rad Laboratories (BIO -0.7%) and Gen-Probe (GPRO -1.1%). Takeout multiples were below current diagnostics multiples, Leerink notes, and the P-E buyout likely means there was little interest in BLUD from strategic acquirers.

     
     
     
     
    | 10:16 AM | 1 Comment
  • NTCT

    NetScout Systems (NTCT -14%) slides after cutting its 2012 profit outlook. The firm says...

    NetScout Systems (NTCT -14%) slides after cutting its 2012 profit outlook. The firm says dwindling federal contracts and weak bookings in its core financial services unit will negatively impact revenue and margins over the near term.

     
     
     
     
    | 10:14 AM
  • IIVI

    II-VI (IIVI +1.4%) acquires Aegis Lightwave for $52M in a deal designed to strengthen the firm's...

    II-VI (IIVI +1.4%) acquires Aegis Lightwave for $52M in a deal designed to strengthen the firm's telecommunications offerings, and provides upward FY12 guidance on earnings and revenue. II-VI's consensus analyst price target is a whopping $62/share.

     
     
     
     
    | 10:12 AM | 1 Comment
  • NFLX

    Dawson James boldly initiates coverage of Netflix (NASDAQ:NFLX) at Sell with a $181 downside...

    Dawson James boldly initiates coverage of Netflix (NASDAQ:NFLX) at Sell with a $181 downside target, citing an 8.7% Y/Y drop in per-subscriber revenue, increased competition (Hulu, AMZN, Facebook, GOOG), rising content costs, and consolidation among CDNs. For now, NFLX is +5% to $281.44. (earlier)
     
     
     
     
    | 10:10 AM | 3 Comments
  • GOOG

    Evercore's Ken Sena is upgrading Google (GOOG +2.4%) to Overweight and boosting his target to...

    Evercore's Ken Sena is upgrading Google (GOOG +2.4%) to Overweight and boosting his target to $670 from $620. Sena's upgrade is due to “a more favorable view of Google’s long-term prospects in Social, Local and Display,” and a belief that concerns about capex and government investigations are priced in.

     
     
     
     
    | 10:01 AM
  • PCXCQ

    Coal companies look to finally garner a little good PR with a new research study showing burning...

    Coal companies look to finally garner a little good PR with a new research study showing burning high-sulphur coal can help the environment by creating a cooling effect. Shares of coal companies gain: Patriot (PCX +1.2%), Arch Coal (ACI +0.3%), Yanzhou Coal (YZC +1.7%), China Natural Resources (CHNR +2.4%).

     
     
     
     
    | 9:54 AM | 5 Comments
  • TGA

    Canadian oil E&P firm TransGlobe Energy (NASDAQ:TGA) up 9% following a similar pop in...

    Canadian oil E&P firm TransGlobe Energy (NASDAQ:TGA) up 9% following a similar pop in Toronto yesterday. Leading into the U.S. holiday, the company agreed to acquire a 50% operated working interest in Egypt's 2,258 square kilometer South Alamein Concession.

     
     
     
     
    | 9:49 AM
  • EPRS

    Oppenheimer initiates Zalicus (ZLCS +7%) with an Outperform, saying the company has “a...

    Oppenheimer initiates Zalicus (ZLCS +7%) with an Outperform, saying the company has “a pipeline of promising candidates targeting potentially large commercial opportunities.” Two possible blockbusters are Synavive for rheumatoid arthritis, and eye allergy drug Prednisporin.

     
     
     
     
    | 9:45 AM
  • TTM

    Sales for Tata's (NYSE:TTM) Jaguars and Land Rovers in China ramp higher on ballooning demand....

    Sales for Tata's (NYSE:TTM) Jaguars and Land Rovers in China ramp higher on ballooning demand. The "luxury-car market in China is red-hot," says veteran analyst Michael Dunne, and "profit margins of Jaguar Land Rover are far higher in China than in any other market in the world." Shares +1.7% premarket.

     
     
     
     
    | 9:35 AM
  • WDC

    SanDisk (SNDK) +2.2% premarket after a weekend Buy upgrade from Deutsche Bank. "We now believe...

    SanDisk (SNDK) +2.2% premarket after a weekend Buy upgrade from Deutsche Bank. "We now believe margins will become far more sustainable in 2012 thanks to balanced industry supply growth and SNDK's leadership in TLC NAND," firm says, adding concerns over NAND oversupply are overblown. "Our checks suggest competitors have failed to chip away SNDK's leading position."

     
     
     
     
    | 9:24 AM
  • NFLX

    Netflix (NASDAQ:NFLX) +3.2% premarket after confirming that it will begin offering its Web video...

    Netflix (NASDAQ:NFLX) +3.2% premarket after confirming that it will begin offering its Web video service in Mexico and 42 other countries in Latin America and the Caribbean later this year. Netflix did not announce a launch date for the move or pricing for the service, which goes for $7.99/month in the U.S. (PR)

     
     
     
     
    | 9:23 AM | 1 Comment
  • AEIS

    Advanced Energy Industries (NASDAQ:AEIS) lowers its Q2 revenue outlook to $137-140M, vs. a...

    Advanced Energy Industries (NASDAQ:AEIS) lowers its Q2 revenue outlook to $137-140M, vs. a previous forecast of $148-160M (May 2). AEIS blames the shift on a drop in solar panel pricing, and complex industry dynamics. AEIS -7% premarket. (PR)

     
     
     
     
    | 9:13 AM
  • BLUD

    Premarket gainers: BLUD +32%. ZLCS +9%. CLWR +4%. AUY +4%. SLW +4%. RENN +3%.Losers: GORO -7%....

    Premarket gainers: BLUD +32%. ZLCS +9%. CLWR +4%. AUY +4%. SLW +4%. RENN +3%.
    Losers: GORO -7%. ALLT -7%. LYG -4%. ACH -4%. AVL -4%.

     
     
     
     
    | 9:05 AM
  • NOK

    Nokia (NYSE:NOK) -1.7% premarket on reports it has cut smartphone prices across its entire...

    Nokia (NYSE:NOK) -1.7% premarket on reports it has cut smartphone prices across its entire portfolio to stem the erosion of its market share. Steepest cuts were 15%, but most were more modest. The breadth of the cuts, however, is unusual and worrisome.

     
     
     
     
    | 9:01 AM
  • JOE

    Bruce Berkowitz - Chairman of St. Joe Co. (NYSE:JOE) - says there's "nothing new" in the SEC's...

    Bruce Berkowitz - Chairman of St. Joe Co. (NYSE:JOE) - says there's "nothing new" in the SEC's announcement of an investigation into the company's real-estate impairment issues stemming from the Florida real estate crash. Shares -3.8% premarket.

     
     
     
     
    | 8:46 AM
  • GORO

    Despite a decent attempt to defend itself, Gold Resource (NYSEMKT:GORO) is getting battered this...

    Despite a decent attempt to defend itself, Gold Resource (NYSEMKT:GORO) is getting battered this morning following a damning Barron's article suggesting the company may be overstating its gold deposit estimates and understating extraction costs. Is GORO heading back to $5/share? Currently: -8.3% to $22.10.

     
     
     
     
    | 8:46 AM
  • ZN

    Shares of Zion Oil & Gas (NASDAQ:ZN) continue their plunge from AH Friday, when the company...

    Shares of Zion Oil & Gas (NASDAQ:ZN) continue their plunge from AH Friday, when the company said there was little chance a well in northern Israel contains commercially viable hydrocarbons. ZN -24.6% premarket.

     
     
     
     
    | 8:31 AM
  • MSFT

    Microsoft (NASDAQ:MSFT) signs a deal to grow its presence in China by offering English-language...

    Microsoft (NASDAQ:MSFT) signs a deal to grow its presence in China by offering English-language services to Chinese search engine Baidu (NASDAQ:BIDU), and launching its own Bing search engine in China by year-end. The deal contrasts sharply with Google's (NASDAQ:GOOG) continual battles with the Chinese government. Premarket: MSFT +0.5%, BIDU +2.3%.

     
     
     
     
    | 8:11 AM | 1 Comment
  • S

    Clearwire (CLWR) raised to Outperform from Neutral at Credit Suisse. Upgrade details to follow....

    Clearwire (CLWR) raised to Outperform from Neutral at Credit Suisse. Upgrade details to follow. Shares +6%.
     
     
     
     
    | 8:07 AM
  • INO

    Inovio Pharmaceuticals (NYSEMKT:INO) shoots up 12.3% premarket after announcing its synthetic...

    Inovio Pharmaceuticals (NYSEMKT:INO) shoots up 12.3% premarket after announcing its synthetic DNA vaccine protects against HIV in animal testing.

     
     
     
     
    | 8:00 AM
